Name: α CrB
Notes:
Alphecca, Alphacca, Alphekka, Gemma, Gnosia, Gnosia Stella Coronae, 
Asteroth, Ashtaroth; Algol variable

Name: ρ CrB
Notes: has a companion, has two planets (b & c), now thought to be a low mass star.

Name: η CrB B
Notes: component of the η CrB system

Name: σ CrB B
Notes: component of the σ CrB system

Name: HD 140913
Notes: solar twin with brown dwarf companion

Name: T CrB
Notes:
recurrent nova and rotating ellipsoidal variable, *V*max = 2.0m, *V*min = 
10.8m, *P* = 227.6 d
